content: Hi @Sandra Vance @Mary Ann Boyle , Can you please make sure that @Ryan Howells has the information to join as a presenter for the 11am PT (2pm ET) session for: "Da Vinci - Patient Access API - Attestation, Identity, and Trust Framework by CARIN" Feel free to add me as a presenter and I can get it to him if that is easier. Thanks!
yes, I can email him the credentials now.
@Vanessa Candelora @Ryan Howells Ryan is not registered to attend the meeting.
